sentence.idiomatic: People from different generations have different views.
They were influenced by the new views of the West.
Do you agree with this kind of traditional view?
Nowadays young people are not willing to take responsibilities for serious tasks.
You should take responsibility for your mistake.
Is Xiao Wang responsible for this project?
You can't always avoid responsibility.
Xiao Wang is not willing to accept the responsibility of looking after a family.
Do children have a responsibility to support their parents?
In order to please his parents, he's doing his best to be a good child.
You shouldn't let him do this.
Is it only money that can give you the good life?
Ever since he was young he's been taking care of his family.
Mrs. Li stays home and takes care of the baby.
Many young people are not willing to look after the elderly.
Mr. Zhang has always showed respect to his parents.
How do you plan to show respect to your parents?
If you don't show respect to your parents, in the future your children won't show respect to you either.
In the winter you should drink more hot water.
We should respect the elderly and take care of the children.
Do you think I should take on this responsibility?
His parents have always had high expectations for him.
Aside from staying healthy, I have no other hopes.
Tell me what your hopes are.
China's education and America's education are not the same.
Did your parents emphasize your education?
These teachers' unceasing hard work has raised people's interest in education as a career.
In the traditional Chinese way of seeing things, a father should be responsible for supporting the family.
He works hard to give his family a good life.
A mother's responsibility is to take care of the whole family.
The children should obey and respect their parents and elders.
They should obey and listen to their parents.
Parents in China pay a lot of attention to their children's education.
They have very high expectations for them.

word.literal: assist one's husband and educate the children (of a virtuous woman)
have good prospects; will go far
hope one's children will have bright futures
